Html: I've just barely started using Rawr, and I enjoy it immensely. While I'm using the Upgrade list maker, I figured I'd ask if it took into account using a non set piece of gear when you don't have 2 or more pieces, over another.

Sorry for the bad explanation.

When looking at the upgrade list, Does it take into account set bonuses? Say I have a 245 pair of gloves, and a 232 pair of t9 gloves. Which does it want me to get? (If both were upgrades)
Yes, set bonuses are taken into account. To see what gloves it wants, mouse over and read the bottom half of the tooltip.

Mouse over the item on the upgrade list(the one that takes my computer forever to complete) or on the list to the right of your char's current gear(the one that is automatically there when I download my char's profile)?
